verses.text_plain: The wicked flee when no man pursueth: but the righteous are bold as a lion.
verses.verse_html: 1The wicked flee when no man pursueth: but the righteous are bold as a lion.

verses.text_plain: For the transgression of a land many are the princes thereof: but by a man of understanding and knowledge the state thereof shall be prolonged.
verses.verse_html:
2For the transgression of a land many are the princes thereof: but by a man of understanding and knowledge the state thereof shall be prolonged. ▼
▼ by…: or, by men of understanding and wisdom shall they likewise be prolonged

footnotes.body_text: ▼ by…: or, by men of understanding and wisdom shall they likewise be prolonged
footnotes.body_html: ▼ by…: or, by men of understanding and wisdom shall they likewise be prolonged

verses.text_plain: A poor man that oppresseth the poor is like a sweeping rain which leaveth no food.
verses.verse_html:
3A poor man that oppresseth the poor is like a sweeping rain which leaveth no food. ▼
▼ which…: Heb. without food

footnotes.body_html: ▼ which…: Heb. without food

verses.text_plain: They that forsake the law praise the wicked: but such as keep the law contend with them.
verses.verse_html: 4They that forsake the law praise the wicked: but such as keep the law contend with them.

verses.text_plain: Evil men understand not judgment: but they that seek the Lord understand all things.
verses.verse_html: 5Evil men understand not judgment: but they that seek the Lord understand all things.

verses.text_plain: Better is the poor that walketh in his uprightness, than he that is perverse in his ways, though he be rich.
verses.verse_html: 6Better is the poor that walketh in his uprightness, than he that is perverse in his ways, though he be rich.

verses.text_plain: Whoso keepeth the law is a wise son: but he that is a companion of riotous men shameth his father.
verses.verse_html:
7Whoso keepeth the law is a wise son: but he that is a companion of riotous men shameth his father. ▼
▼ is a companion…: or, feedeth gluttons

tokens.text: but he that is a companion

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is a companion…: or, feedeth gluttons
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is a companion…: or, feedeth gluttons

verses.text_plain: He that by usury and unjust gain increaseth his substance, he shall gather it for him that will pity the poor.
verses.verse_html:
8He that by usury and unjust gain increaseth his substance, he shall gather it for him that will pity the poor. ▼
▼ unjust…: Heb. by increase

tokens.text: it for him that will pity

footnotes.body_html: ▼ unjust…: Heb. by increase

verses.text_plain: He that turneth away his ear from hearing the law, even his prayer shall be abomination.
verses.verse_html: 9He that turneth away his ear from hearing the law, even his prayer shall be abomination.

verses.text_plain: Whoso causeth the righteous to go astray in an evil way, he shall fall himself into his own pit: but the upright shall have good things in possession.
verses.verse_html: 10Whoso causeth the righteous to go astray in an evil way, he shall fall himself into his own pit: but the upright shall have good things in possession.

verses.text_plain: The rich man is wise in his own conceit; but the poor that hath understanding searcheth him out.
verses.verse_html:
11The rich man is wise in his own conceit; but the poor that hath understanding searcheth him out. ▼
▼ own…: Heb. eyes

verses.text_plain: When righteous men do rejoice, there is great glory: but when the wicked rise, a man is hidden.
verses.verse_html:
12When righteous men do rejoice, there is great glory: but when the wicked rise, a man is hidden. ▼
▼ hidden: or, sought for

footnotes.body_html: ▼ hidden: or, sought for

verses.text_plain: He that covereth his sins shall not prosper: but whoso confesseth and forsaketh them shall have mercy.
verses.verse_html: 13He that covereth his sins shall not prosper: but whoso confesseth and forsaketh them shall have mercy.

verses.text_plain: Happy is the man that feareth alway: but he that hardeneth his heart shall fall into mischief.
verses.verse_html: 14Happy is the man that feareth alway: but he that hardeneth his heart shall fall into mischief.

verses.text_plain: As a roaring lion, and a ranging bear; so is a wicked ruler over the poor people.
verses.verse_html: 15As a roaring lion, and a ranging bear; so is a wicked ruler over the poor people.

verses.text_plain: The prince that wanteth understanding is also a great oppressor: but he that hateth covetousness shall prolong his days.
verses.verse_html: 16The prince that wanteth understanding is also a great oppressor: but he that hateth covetousness shall prolong his days.

verses.text_plain: A man that doeth violence to the blood of any person shall flee to the pit; let no man stay him.
verses.verse_html: 17A man that doeth violence to the blood of any person shall flee to the pit; let no man stay him.

verses.text_plain: Whoso walketh uprightly shall be saved: but he that is perverse in his ways shall fall at once.
verses.verse_html: 18Whoso walketh uprightly shall be saved: but he that is perverse in his ways shall fall at once.

verses.text_plain: He that tilleth his land shall have plenty of bread: but he that followeth after vain persons shall have poverty enough.
verses.verse_html: 19He that tilleth his land shall have plenty of bread: but he that followeth after vain persons shall have poverty enough.

verses.text_plain: A faithful man shall abound with blessings: but he that maketh haste to be rich shall not be innocent.
verses.verse_html:
20A faithful man shall abound with blessings: but he that maketh haste to be rich shall not be innocent. ▼
▼ innocent: or, unpunished

verses.text_plain: To have respect of persons is not good: for for a piece of bread that man will transgress.
verses.verse_html: 21To have respect of persons is not good: for for a piece of bread that man will transgress.

verses.text_plain: He that hasteth to be rich hath an evil eye, and considereth not that poverty shall come upon him.
verses.verse_html:
22He that hasteth to be rich hath an evil eye, and considereth not that poverty shall come upon him. ▼
▼ hasteth…: or, hath and evil eye hasteth to be rich

footnotes.body_text: ▼ hasteth…: or, hath and evil eye hasteth to be rich
footnotes.body_html: ▼ hasteth…: or, hath and evil eye hasteth to be rich

verses.text_plain: He that rebuketh a man afterwards shall find more favour than he that flattereth with the tongue.
verses.verse_html: 23He that rebuketh a man afterwards shall find more favour than he that flattereth with the tongue.

verses.text_plain: Whoso robbeth his father or his mother, and saith, It is no transgression; the same is the companion of a destroyer.
verses.verse_html:
24Whoso robbeth his father or his mother, and saith, It is no transgression; the same is the companion of a destroyer. ▼
▼ a destroyer: Heb. a man destroying

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a destroyer: Heb. a man destroying
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a destroyer: Heb. a man destroying

verses.text_plain: He that is of a proud heart stirreth up strife: but he that putteth his trust in the Lord shall be made fat.
verses.verse_html: 25He that is of a proud heart stirreth up strife: but he that putteth his trust in the Lord shall be made fat.

tokens.text: He that is of a proud
but he that putteth his trust

verses.text_plain: He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.
verses.verse_html: 26He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.

verses.text_plain: He that giveth unto the poor shall not lack: but he that hideth his eyes shall have many a curse.
verses.verse_html: 27He that giveth unto the poor shall not lack: but he that hideth his eyes shall have many a curse.

verses.text_plain: When the wicked rise, men hide themselves: but when they perish, the righteous increase.
verses.verse_html: 28When the wicked rise, men hide themselves: but when they perish, the righteous increase.
